unnormalised: Crop insurance, huh? Needed more than ever, especially with unpredictable monsoons hitting Maharashtra and Bihar! Remember last year's floods near Patna? Jai Kisan Yojana is okay, but claim settlement is still slow. My uncle, Ramu Kaka, still waiting for his Rs. 5000 after the drought in '22. This Onam, hoping for a bumper harvest and no need for insurance claims! Biryani will taste sweeter then! Gotta keep praying to Indra Deva.
normalised: Crop insurance, huh? Needed more than ever, especially with unpredictable monsoons hitting Maharashtra and Bihar! Remember last year's floods near Patna? J A I Kisan Yojana is okay, but claim settlement is still slow. My uncle, Ramu Kaka, still waiting for his rupee five thousand after the drought in two thousand twenty two. This Onam, hoping for a bumper harvest and no need for insurance claims! Biryani will taste sweeter then! Gotta keep praying to Indra Deva.
